it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Dice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents a Dice with 6 sides (value from 1 to 6)
    Author:
    Federico Haag
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • incrementValue

        public boolean incrementValue()
        Increments by one the Dice's value
        Returns:
        if the increment was possible (can't increment a Dice that has the maximum value)

      • decrementValue

        public boolean decrementValue()
        Decrement by one the Dice's value
        Returns:
        if the decrement was possible (can't decrement a Dice that has the minimum value)
